hadiths.text: Sahl As-Sa'idi, may Allah be pleased with him, said:"I heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) say: 'Whoever is in the Masjid waiting for the prayer, he is in a state of prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّرْغِيبِ فِي الْجُلُوسِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ وَانْتِظَارِ الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Encouragement To Sit In The Masjid And Wait For The Prayer
